title: Covid-19 Pandemic Pastoring: Isolation Begins
description:
There is no bigger news than the world Pandemic. This has taken over reality  for most of us. I'm going to vlog my experience of this lest I forget. I also think this is a golden opportunity to do a lot of reflection and learning about knowing and sense-making. I expect we are in this for the long haul. Here is my first report. 

Dr. John Campbell's YouTube Channel https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCF9IOB2TExg3QIBupFtBDxg
Jordan Peterson at Lafayette College https://youtu.be/V32WHDuy-Do
John Vervaeke Awakening from the Meaning Crisis https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLND1JCRq8Vuh3f0P5qjrSdb5eC1ZfZwWJ
Rhett and Link Not Sure https://youtu.be/M-84-dJUWdo
Jesus, Nicodemus, Serpents of Numbers 21 Sermon https://youtu.be/xTjRG-ItQ2Y
Sunday School classes on Nicodemus https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLS_9gLx08z7T6A3G89IDuGmItUZj9C39a
March 15 Online Service Video https://youtu.be/1qH52wjEp8o
Ross Douthat Decadent Society https://amzn.to/2wlb2dg
Tom Holland Dominion https://amzn.to/2wgoEGI
